content: click here for free pattern tutorial ** mobile phone pocket tutorial 1 ** we re crafting something stylish and useful - the beginner friendly mobile phone pocket inspired by issey miyake s iphone pocket this short mobile phone pocket is useful and looks great in any color and what s more its completely beginner friendly if you re a fan of the iphone pocket or a beginner searching for an easy pattern this tutorial is perfect for you what can you make if you only know single_crochet make this little mobile phone pocket of course join us as we guide you through the entire process of making this mobile phone pocket from start to finish with our easy-to-follow instructions you ll have your own pocket in no time whether you re a seasoned crocheter or just starting out you ll find this mobile phone pocket tutorial both enjoyable and rewarding you will need * yarn - medium weight yarn about 80 grams in any color thick yarn does not work here if possible choose a yarn with little stretch * crochet hook 3mm * yarn needle if you want your mobile phone pocket to be the same size as mine use any non-stretch yarn that can fit nicely on a 3mm/no 5 hook in this tutorial you ll learn * how to crochet a mobile phone pocket that is completely beginner friendly * step-by-step crochet instructions with detailed visuals ✨ why you ll love this tutorial * clear easy-to-follow instructions * high-quality close-up visuals to guide you through each step * a fun and rewarding project that would make a great gift 1 https //youtu be/8rrvkvla6rs
